activities:
Real Magnet is an Email Service Provider.  Therefore, we address privacy at two levels: 1) as a business that collects certain information on our customers and prospects for purposes of education, administration, and marketing, and 2) as a business who licenses web-bases software that enables customers to distribute mass emails, faxes, and surveys to their customers and prospects.  These lists are hosted on the servers of Real Magnet's hosting provider.

Real Magnet's privacy policy addresses both levels of our business.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Real Magnet hosts lists for its customers.  These lists may contain sensitive information.  Real Magnet has no control over how data in its system was gathered.  However, it encourages customers to never import this type of data due to general internet security concerns.  None of our data is manually processed.
recoursemech: Real Magnet will cooperate and comply with the appropriate data protection authorities (EU DPAs and Swiss FDPIC) for any unresolved complaints.
